name: Zavo
long_description:
Zavo is the first AI-native platform for in-person commerce. We bring together payments, point of sale, and AI agents into one seamless system, giving every restaurant and retail business its own 24/7 digital workforce. 

Launched in April 2025, Zavo already powers 350+ small and medium-sized businesses.

With Zavo, businesses can:

- Accept in-person & online card payments
- Run their entire Food & Beverage or Retail operation through Zavo Point of Sale
- Save time and money with instant settlements and flat, transparent pricing on card fees
- Unlock AI agents that automate finance, operations, and customer engagement

The Zavo AI Agent Suite:

- CFO Agent - Your personal CFO. Knows every number. Delivers forecasts, reports, and real-time insights.
- Manager Agent - Your personal manager. Knows products, inventory, sales, and staffing to keep operations seamless.
- Customer Agent - Your front of house. Knows every customer, drives loyalty, repeat visits, and tailored relationships.

Our Vision:

SMEs drive the global economy yet remain underserved by large SaaS and AI providers. Zavo is building the future of in-person commerce, delivering enterprise-grade intelligence, automation, and modern payments to every local business.
one_liner: AI-Native operating system for in-person commerce
